snippet: Economists were not too concerned with the reports from the Institute for Supply Management and ADP, and awaited government figures.
abstract: Institute for Supply Management says its index of nonmanufacturing activity fell to 54.4 in March, from 56 in February; ADP reports private employers added 158,000 jobs in March, down from 237,000 in February.
lead_paragraph: Economists were not too concerned with the reports from the Institute for Supply Management and ADP, and awaited government figures.

headline.seo: Reports Show Weaker Hiring and Service Sector Growth
